txt.en: The refugees of Byre Tor shiver in their cave, having escaped their homes in great haste.

'What do ye want, stranger? We'll survive here, mark my words. We women of Byre Tor are hardy. We do not need yer help.'

You notice Edhild's fingers have turned rather blue, and she shivers beneath her stubborn demeanor.

You should bring pelts to these people, so that they can survive here.

'Did ye not hear me, [placeholder]? I said we don't need yer help! The women of Byre Tor are --'

Edhild pauses to eye the pile of warm pelts.

'I suppose... there is no use letting these fine furs go to waste. Thank ye, I suppose.'
Snow-cats can be found throughout the High Knolls.\n\nYou should collect pelts from snow-cats.

'Did ye not hear me, [placeholder]? I said we don't need yer help! The women of Byre Tor are --'

<NPC TBD> pauses to eye the pile of warm pelts.

'I suppose...there is no use letting these fine furs go to waste. Thank ye, I suppose.'
Edhild can be found in the refugees' cave in the High Knolls.\n\nYou should bring the pelts you gathered to Edhild to warm her.
